param.name: storeID
param.label: Store ID
param.description: The ID to your store. (On the store dashboard, you will find embedding instructions. Look for this 'http://app.ecwid.com/script.js?1003'. The NUMBER at the end is your store number

param.name: categoriesPerRow
param.label: Categories Per Row
param.description: How many categories will be in one row

param.name: defaultCategory
param.label: Default Category ID
param.description: For showing a default category. Leave blank if you don't want to show a default category.

param.name: searchView
param.label: Default Search View
param.description: The default layout of the search view

param.name: grid
param.label: Grid Amount
param.description: Grid Layout: i.e 3,3 = 3 columns with 3 products per row

param.name: list
param.label: List Amount
param.description: How many items in the list view

param.name: table
param.label: Table Amount
param.description: How many items in the table view
